    • putRainbowButton

      public boolean putRainbowButton(int x, int y)
      Puts rainbow color button on the board if player has placed a color button of each color and the target field contains a regular tile and doesn't contain a button and rainbow button wasn't already placed
      Parameters:
      x - x position of the field
      y - y position of the field
      Returns:
      if placing the button was successful (

    • putColorButton

      public boolean putColorButton(int x, int y)
      Puts a color button on the board if the target field has a regular tile and does not contain a button and is not a part of a group of tiles that already contain a color button. To do it, it finds the group of tiles with the same color as the target's field tile and if the size of the group is at least three it will place a new button there with the correct color. It updates all the fields of the group so no other color buttons can be placed on it and updates the map to track which color buttons were placed
      Parameters:
      x - x position of the field
      y - y position of the field
      Returns:
      if placing the button was successful

    • putCatButton

      public boolean putCatButton(CatButton button, int x, int y, TilePattern[] catsPreferred)
      Puts a cat button on the board if the target field has a regular tile and does not contain a button and is not a part of a group of tiles that already contains a cat button and the pattern of the tile matches either of the cats preferred pattern. To do it, it finds the group of tiles with the same pattern as the target field's tile and applied an appropriate check depending on the cat checking the group size or the line length or performs a cluster check
      Parameters:
      button - cat button to place
      x - x position of the field
      y - y position of the field
      catsPreferred - cat's preferred patterns
      Returns:
      if placing the button was successful

    • getGroup

      public ArrayList<Field> getGroup(Field starting, boolean byPattern)
      Gets group of tiles of either the same color or pattern
      Parameters:
      starting - field to start finding the group from
      byPattern - searches by patter if true else by color
      Returns:
      group of matching tiles

    • getRandom

      public static Board getRandom(Random random)
      Generates a random board (initializes the board and fills the edges with random tiles in such a way so patterns and colors don't end up close to each other
      Parameters:
      random - random variable
      Returns:
      a random board

    • setProjectTiles

      public boolean setProjectTiles(ProjectTile left, ProjectTile center, ProjectTile right)
      Sets the project tiles on the board if they were not already
      Parameters:
      left - project tile for x = 2, y = 4
      center - project tile for x = 3, y = 2
      right - project tile for x = 4, y = 3
      Returns:
      if setting the project tiles was successful

      index - number specifying which neighbour: 0 - top left, 1 - top right, 2 - right, 3 - bottom right, 4 - bottom left, 5 - left
